description: A criminal case is under way in Germany's biggest post-war accounting scandal.
title: Wirecard scandal: German MPs question ex-boss Braun
title_page: Wirecard scandal: German MPs question ex-boss Braun - BBC News
maintext: The former board chairman said he had seen no evidence or indication that any public officials had behaved improperly in connection with Wirecard, and added that he would speak next to the state prosecutors. He refused to comment further on the scandal.
